description: Bill Cao is an undergraduate at UC Berkeley graduating with a B.S. in Electrical Engineering & Computer Sciences and a B.S. in Bioengineering in May 2016. He joined the Clotho team with a goal to facilitate innovation in synthetic biology utilizing the power of computation. His interests include computational medicine, entrepreneurship, and anything fun that gets him away from a computer screen.
name: Bill Cao
title: Full Stack Developer
